Sequence Information.Peptide Name: CA-AMP1 (C. annuum AMP1; natural AMPs; plants, 3S=S, UCSS1a)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is most similar (81.25%) toCC-AMP1C=K: 19%, V=L: 13%. GRAVY: 0.556; mol wt: 3493.399; mol formula: C154H264N39O40S6; mol ex coeff: 5925.Activity: active against E. coli ATCC 25922, K. pneumoniae VK148 (LC50 13.2 uM), P. aeruginosa 1423 (LC50 6.9 uM), A. baumannii 5075 (IC50 4.0 uM).
Literature Information.Author: Culver KD, Sadecki PW, Jackson JK, Brown ZA, Hnilica ME, Wu J, Shaw LN, Wommack AJ, Hicks LM.2024
Literature Information.Title: Identification and Characterization of CC-AMP1-like and CC-AMP2-like Peptides in Capsicum spp.
